long_description: The ultimate eyewear accessory for the water-based active lifestyle! It's both an eyewear retainer and a soft case (neoprene case floats in water). In addition, detachable clips allow retainer to be used as a snug-fitting strap for extreme and high-endurance activities. Double-roll construction allows soft case to be rolled up and hidden inside of retainer strap. Case portion of retainer is made from super-buoyant neoprene that keeps your shades floating in case you drop them in the drink. Case can be stretched from hinge to hinge across glasses and used as a soft case. Constructed from high-quality, super-soft DuPont(TM) microfiber and neoprene.
short_description: The ultimate eyewear accessory for the water-based active lifestyle! It's both an eyewear retainer and a soft case (neoprene case floats in water).
